Reviews.Title: Great addition
Reviews.Author: EM from New Jersey
Reviews.Content: Simple cable that comes with adapter to be use with the infrared camera that I bought to hooked straight into RCA input of a CRT tv for monitor. Works great! Would recommend.

Reviews.Title: NOT MALE TO FEMALE
Reviews.Author: James & Shelby
Reviews.Content: This product is pictured and advertised as male to female however all 8 of my cables came MALE TO MALE. The horrible, outsourced to india, barely speak engrish customer support sent me 8 replacements ALL MALE TO MALE again. At this point I just wanted my money back which they refused. So now I have to buy 16 adapters. This company is a disgrace and Amazon should be ashamed they still offer this companies products.

Reviews.Title: Good Deal, But 1 BNC Female to RCA Male Connector Defective.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Addict
Reviews.Content: This was a good deal and seems to work well, except one of the BNC Female to RCA Male connectors/adapter was defective and did not work properly. I had to purchase a replacement Cables To Go 02455 BNC Female to RCA Male Adapter (Silver) for $2.49 on Amazon. It was easier for me to just buy a replacement adapter rather than deal with returning this product. This is a good deal, just be warned there is a possibly you'll run into trouble like I did.

Reviews.Title: Great Quality for a long 100 foot Cable
Reviews.Author: Texas Aggie
Reviews.Content: This 100 foot Audio/Video/Power Cable works great for our Daytime/Nightvision Camera that we use for a Day & Night Baby Monitor for our 2 year old Twins.  Instead of paying $130+ for an overpriced Fisher Price Audio/Video baby monitor that still has to plug into an A/C Electric Plug for the Transmitter which can kill a full grown adult, you don't want your baby/toddler touching those electric contacts and killing themselves either.  Use the 12 volt DC power supply for these cameras and plug it in from another room.  Works great!

Reviews.Title: Made my cameras fuzzy
Reviews.Author: Rick B.
Reviews.Content: I used these on cameras that I had used with other cables.  When I used these cables the picture became fuzzy and out of focus.

Reviews.Title: Best cable worth buying
Reviews.Author: Brad
Reviews.Content: Well since I do Paranormal studies and use CCTV Camera units, I have to buy these cords, I am happy with these cables and plan to buy many more and in different sizes.

Reviews.Title: not working on my security cam
Reviews.Author: Ricky Ford
Reviews.Content: VideoSecu AV Video Audio & Power 100 Feet BNC Cable for CCTV Video...I need to send it back the cable not working on my security cam thank you

Reviews.Title: More for the money
Reviews.Author: I. May
Reviews.Content: How much you pay and what you're going to get is worth the value.  Just get ready to spend a good amount of time untangling the cable.

Reviews.Title: cost cutting
Reviews.Author: Michael K.
Reviews.Content: i had to install a few cameras with audio these cables worked great cut cost and time contiue to use them

Reviews.Title: Works fine
Reviews.Author: DG
Reviews.Content: Not the highest quality cable, and it's not shielded, but it works just fine for it's purpose. Good product for the money.

Reviews.Title: for mike, power, & video
Reviews.Author: ken
Reviews.Content: Poor RCA plugs plus one that got center pin broken quickly, is why I took off 2 stars. See review for my 50' cable, as I have 2 cameras, 2 mikes, in different locations.

Reviews.Title: Video, Audio, and Power Supply Cable
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "vkwash"
Reviews.Content: I'm pretty sure I made a review on this product earlier, saying that it made my nightime picture roll. We have found out since then that it is the camera that is at fault, not the cable's.

Reviews.Title: GREAT SELECTION OF WIRING FOR ECONOMY, EFFECTIVENESS, AND INSTALLATION!!
Reviews.Author: Scorpio Sun 46
Reviews.Content: I am quite late in providing a comment. Truth be told, I have bought (and used) a ton of this wiring over a several year period. It is easy to understand, and problem free to install. It is adequately constructed for my purposes, namely maintaining a closed circuit TV monitoring system for my home and property. I would recommend it to others without reservation. I would perhaps prefer that it not ever get “tangled” (reminiscent of backlashes you encounter with a bait cast reel when fishing), but hey, it is well worth the money, and to be fair, it doesn’t get “tangled” all that frequently.

Reviews.Title: Just what I needed
Reviews.Author: Ruso Minnifield "PrinceHappy2"
Reviews.Content: The VideoSecu AV Video Audio & Power 100 Feet BNC Cable for CCTV Video works great.  It gave me the extra length I needed for the Audio.  Great deal...

Reviews.Title: can hear out side if you all don't sell them do you all know anybody that do sell them at  a a resemble
Reviews.Author: Beulah Hicks
Reviews.Content: I gave it  a give star because the videowires are ok except we don't have the video plugs on our camera.I still don't have video on my camera so I can hear what is going on out side.I just wondehear1r if you all had any thing  so we can pick up the audio so we can hear outside. Do you all sell Swann single color security camera that have audio and video so we can hear what

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: kcrocker
Reviews.Content: This works great with my CCTV camera, the cord was nice and long. Could of got by with a little shorter one.

Reviews.Title: Exactly What I Needed
Reviews.Author: MWCraft
Reviews.Content: I have used 60 ft cables before and knew I needed a longer run for a camera I mounted in my garage.  This cable performed the job with room to spare and I am very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Dean Mills
Reviews.Content: This is a great extension wire and had all the pieces I needed to make the connection I needed.  Thanks

Reviews.Title: check before you install
Reviews.Author: Efrain
Reviews.Content: Cable did not work at all. 12V gets lost in the camera end had to take off and  go buy one with no audio

Reviews.Title: Nice deal
Reviews.Author: vic
Reviews.Content: Does the job, but be careful when installing cause the wire is kind if thin but once you installed it works OK. Mine is good after three weeks since installation, hope to be good years.

Reviews.Title: CCTV Camera Cable
Reviews.Author: Stevie
Reviews.Content: That is a very inexpensive price for 100 ft.You be surprised how it doesn't contain anyinterference ( being it 100 ft).

Reviews.Title: GOT THE JOB DONE!
Reviews.Author: BigBoy
Reviews.Content: SECURITY USED TO BE AN ISSUE IN MY OFFICE. I COULDN'T SEE FROM MULTIPLE LOCATIONS.  NOT ANYMORE ALL IS WELL, AND THANKS TO THIS BABY!

Reviews.Title: Good for extended range
Reviews.Author: R.J.Camera
Reviews.Content: I ran it outside to a pole and I hope it is UV rated but it has been holding up in the Florida Sun and rain for over a month so far

Reviews.Title: Awesome cable! good quality and length
Reviews.Author: Cyberlinxz
Reviews.Content: Awesome cable! good quality and length and it comes with bnc female to rca male ends if you ever have to re purpose the cable or use for another system! will be buying more!

Reviews.Title: video cable
Reviews.Author: Mark Langlois
Reviews.Content: the extra cable length came in handy when we installed the system on my house.we ran the cable around the front to get a view.

Reviews.Title: Didn't work.
Reviews.Author: SouthernAmazoner
Reviews.Content: The first cable I bought didn't work.  Returned for a refund and ordered another that works fine. Wish I could have just returned for exchange but wasn't allowed to.

Reviews.Title: Works with my video camera and DVR
Reviews.Author: Aris Abeleda
Reviews.Content: I had these wires installed while my house was being built, and it connects my video cameras to my security DVR with no problems.

Reviews.Title: videosecu av video power cord 100 feet with bnc
Reviews.Author: LouieD
Reviews.Content: good quality and product is exactly as described and very easy to set up and arrived quickly and properly packed

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: DrDave
Reviews.Content: Cable works great! Everything I've purchased from Videosecu has been beyond my expectations. Full blown 24 hour sureveillance at a fraction of the cost of most comparable systems.

Reviews.Title: BARE BONES MINIMUM THAT THEY CAN MAKE.
Reviews.Author: bikeryakman
Reviews.Content: THE FOREIGN MANUFACTURER,(NOT AMERICAN MADE) OF THESE CABLE SETS USES THE MOST BARE BONES MINIMUM WIRE GAUGE SIZE THAT THEY CAN USE FOR THE D.C. VOLTAGE AND CURRENT ALLOWED FOR SECURITY CAMERA APPLICATIONS. I BELIEVE THAT THE WIRE SIZE WITH ONLY THREE CONDUCTORS INSIDE AND OUTER JACKET INSULATION IS INFERIOR TO AMERICAN MADE WIRE AND IS VERY FRAGILE TO HANDLE. IT IS VERY PRONE TO DAMAGE BECAUSE OF IT'S CONSTRUCTION AND MINISCULE SIZE. WHEN YOU CONSIDER THE FACTS THAT MOST OF THESE INSTALLATIONS FOR C.C.T.V. CAMERAS ARE GOING TO BE OUTDOOR INSTALLATIONS AND THEREFORE THE WIRING WILL BE EXPOSED TO THE SUN'S UV RAYS AND OTHER WEATHER RELATED FACTORS, I DON'T UNDERSTAND WHY THEY COULD NOT MAKE THESE CABLE SETS A LITTLE MORE HEAVY DUTY AND PLACING THE WIRING INTO A PROTECTIVE BARRIER LIKE CONDUIT OR PLASTIC TUBING SHOULD NOT BE NECESSARY. ALSO THE WIRE SETS ARE PACKAGED IN SUCH A WAY THAT IT TAKES QUITE A LENGTHY TIME TO UNTANGLE THE WIRES FOR PROPER INSTALLATION PURPOSES INITIALLY. ONE MUST BE VERY CAREFUL WHEN INSTALLING THIS WIRING ON THE EXTERIOR OF BUILDINGS MAKING SURE THAT THE WIRE BENDS ARE NOT TOO SHARP OF A RADIUS AND ALSO EXTREME CAUTION MUST BE USED WHEN CABLE STAPLING OR OTHERWISE SECURING THIS WIRING. IT IS A GOOD QUALITY PRODUCT AS FAR AS PICTURE RESOLUTION IS CONCERNED, BUT SURELY IT IS THE BARE BONES MINIMUM IN QUALITY WIRE AND LEAVES A WHOLE LOT TO BE DESIRED. MY BEST SUGGESTION WOULD BE TO PURCHASE EXTRA SETS OF CABLES BECAUSE THEY JUST DO NOT LAST VERY LONG WHEN USED OUTDOORS.

Reviews.Title: Good video Cable
Reviews.Author: PEDRO L VAZQUEZ
Reviews.Content: Cable meet the expectations and solved my basic home problem for an outside camera with audio. The price was reasonable.

Reviews.Title: good product.
Reviews.Author: T. Sipos
Reviews.Content: The cable is great for general purpose cameras. I put two staples through my cable and it still works. Good value for your money.

Reviews.Title: It looks good.
Reviews.Author: DJ
Reviews.Content: I was not able to use this item with the camera I also bought with it. There were no instructions. But to defend the cable wire it was nice, it was not cheaply made.

Reviews.Title: An execellent value
Reviews.Author: snackdaddy
Reviews.Content: I picked this cable because if you think you might need a mic in your security camera system you just add the mic to the end where the camera is located. Ive bought and used these cables several times on different houses without any problems at all. The cables are very flexable and easy to run. They also come with the BNC to RCA adapters. If you using your T.V. for a monitor in your security camera system the BNC to RCA adapters solve connection issues might have had.

Reviews.Title: VideoSecu AV Video Audio & Power 100 Feet BNC Cable for CCTV Video Security Surveillance Camera with 2 RCA Male to BNC Female Co
Reviews.Author: Cecil Smyre "CSmyre64"
Reviews.Content: Seller was great. The cable is a low quality cable it has all wires wrapped into one shield instead of the two separately shielded wires one video and one power, found on most of the higher quality cables. Other than that the actual picture is pretty good at the end of the 100ft run, i have some interference but usable video. Look closely at the cable to see what i'm talking about. Also like other  reviewers have said be careful when you unwrap the cable could easily become tangled and cost you hours of work. I took my time and didn't have a whole lot of problem, (more than usual but not hours).

Reviews.Title: Great cables
Reviews.Author: J. Prewitt
Reviews.Content: Superfast shipping as always! These cables are fine quality for what they cost. No seeable loss in picture or audio. The outer jacket is plenty tough unless you are pulling through a drop ceiling. Re3ccommend you but these and save the video/power cables as backups.

Reviews.Title: Good for the money
Reviews.Author: Ernie
Reviews.Content: Item good for the money, package is lousy, if not careful, it will take one hour to unspool the wire.

Reviews.Title: Good Deal
Reviews.Author: moe762x39
Reviews.Content: This ia a good price for this. Dont get to carried away when you are running this wire. It is pretty thin and looks like it could be damaged easily. Oh and as stated before whoever wraps these things up are idiots. Be prepared to untangle this once you decided to unwind it.

Reviews.Title: excellent buy
Reviews.Author: Eduardo L. Rincon "Happy buyer"
Reviews.Content: I used for my security camera and working excellent fast and easy connection, this cables help me to much for my needs. thank you  pvh3424

Reviews.Title: Low Priced Quality Cable
Reviews.Author: Goose
Reviews.Content: Pros:- Quality is good - connectors have good boots and are tight.- It comes with an adapter to convert BNC to RCA.- This is a good deal for this length of wire (including audio).Cons:- Wire jacket is thin which makes it easy to fish through walls, but it probably could be damaged easily if mistreated.- They doubled it up before wrapping it so it needs to be untangled and straighten out before running it (another person mentioned this as well).If you need a long cable for a permanent install or an application where it will not be exposed to a lot of wear this is it. I would recommend it to anyone and I have bought several of these.

Reviews.Title: quality cable
Reviews.Author: L. H. Miller
Reviews.Content: This is a great quality wire.  It's easy to work with. I have been using this cable to extend one of my CCTV cameras in the office for a few weeks now. No problems what so ever with connetivity or audio video clarity.

Reviews.Title: quality fast tangled wire ;-)
Reviews.Author: ga boy
Reviews.Content: great deal great quality wire, great fast service but......whoever wound the wire in the doubled up fashion it came wasnt thinking, became a tangled mess, would be better on some sort of small reel otherwise great product ;-) Adam

Reviews.Title: cant separate the ends !
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: These are not very useful unless your connections are all within about 6" or less of each other, which mine are not. all 3 wires combine into one  with maybe 6" of individual separate wire and cannot be separated without destroying them . may be good for connecting end to end if you have a short jumper to your power supply and a/v inputs

Reviews.Title: It took me forver
Reviews.Author: mike
Reviews.Content: It took me forver to find a cable like this. I went to every store and no one had one long enough or had what I wanted. Finally with a cuple of products of Amazon I was able to get my home theatre set up.

Reviews.Title: Couldnt figure it out
Reviews.Author: RobSegura82
Reviews.Content: I couldnt figure out how to set this up to be able to use it. Oh well. Buy at your own risk

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Gaigemc
Reviews.Content: Not much to say for cable other than it is good quality and does the job. You might find it $1 cheaper from Hong Kong sites but then you have extra shipping time

Reviews.Title: 100 Feet BNC Cable for CCTV Video...
Reviews.Author: Doyal Richie
Reviews.Content: I have not used this yet but it looks good and if I have a problem with it I will let you know.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: d1234
Reviews.Content: good product does what it supposed to do and works good its in the attic and camera is on so its working

Reviews.Title: The 50' audio vidio cable
Reviews.Author: RT
Reviews.Content: I have purchased several of these cables and I think it’s a grate deal, I highly recommend if you need cabling, this will do the job with confidence. It has adaptors that allows you to fit all situations your needs may be. I have used these cables for distances up to 300’ with no visible degradation. I have not found anything comparable to this product.

Reviews.Title: looking for more feet in rca jack
Reviews.Author: doc dre
Reviews.Content: the price was just right for this cord did not need that much cord but for the price you just cannot beat it .

Reviews.Title: Good Quality for the money
Reviews.Author: Thomas E. Marnik
Reviews.Content: This is perfect for a small business owner like me to get a security system at a reasonable cost.  Good quality and not that hard to unroll as others have commented.

Reviews.Title: It works. No problems. Just a great cable
Reviews.Author: Warren
Reviews.Content: Single wire makes it easy to embed under things or through things. With a 1/8 inch hole or so drilled through the wall, I cut the cable in two and was able to thread it through the wall without a gargantuan hole to fit the bnc/rca plugs.

Reviews.Title: good quality
Reviews.Author: Rick Russ
Reviews.Content: Good quality, was able to connect my video surveillance to a tv in my living room. very nice to have the extra connectors as well.

Reviews.Title: Vid security 100 ft cable
Reviews.Author: Kevin "€x°¶}u$"
Reviews.Content: Received my cams and cable the other night, received before due date. 100 ft was perfect to place my cams where I wanted them. I feel the cables are strong and durable, and will last a long time. I purchased two and each cable came with two adapters to hook up with more ease. Very pleased with product and seller.

Reviews.Title: VideoSecu AV BNC
Reviews.Author: Charles W. McLamara
Reviews.Content: There is nothing but good that I can say about this BNC.I't cover's it all audio and video.If your watching things or monitoring places,you won't miss a word or a visual with this BNC cable.Thank You

Reviews.Title: Works great.
Reviews.Author: Bryce
Reviews.Content: I put in a 32 camera surveillance system in my house when during construction framing/electrical it and used a bunch of these wires at that time. They were then had drywall/stone/stucco/etc put over and worked just fine. I haven't had any issues with them at all and the audio/video quality is great without any loss. I have a Night Owl system, but have several different makes/models of cameras running on these cables without any issues.

Reviews.Title: Good cables
Reviews.Author: keith
Reviews.Content: did the job and a good price, would deffienetly buy again for future cameras I put up. I woudl reccomend

Reviews.Title: Works with my new Zmodo sound camera...
Reviews.Author: Charles B. Firth "Chuck"
Reviews.Content: Got this for my new Zmodo camera with audio. Works great. I wish I could have gotten a shorter cable since this was way overkill for what I needed, but the quality for my less-than-HD camera is fine.

Reviews.Title: A bit unpleased
Reviews.Author: Scott M. Sargent "Scott"
Reviews.Content: I should have looked more closely at the picture, but I did not.  I was hoping for a 100' cable that had audio, video and power and thats what I got.  However, it is only 1 cable that can not be split.  The end that plugs into the dvr and power is only a little pigtail off the main cable.  It could NOT be split causing a lot of grief for me.  Unless I put the DVR right on top of the power supply, I had to order a power extension cable.  So, I might have saved initially on the money for this cable, but had to spend another $7 on the power extension cable.

Reviews.Title: Not enough separation at the ends.
Reviews.Author: Tzimm
Reviews.Content: The connections on the back of my DVR for power, video, and audio are separated across the back of the case. The single cable did not reach the 3 inputs without adding additional 12 inch extensions.

ProductInfo.Features:
Comes with 2 RCA Male to BNC Female adaptors
All-in-one audio, video and power cable 100 feet
Plug and Play ready. For camera with DC power only
RCA for audio and BNC for video
2.1mm power connectors
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu AV Video Audio & Power 100 Feet BNC Cable for CCTV Video Security Surveillance Camera with 2 RCA Male to BNC Female Connectors 3JG
